parts.text: @patch @probe @ship Please review the PRD at docs/dev/prd-ooda-loop.md. The review checklist has been added to wf-r1d.2 in beads and also posted here. Please paste your Reviewer response under the 'Reviewer response' heading in the beads comment or reply here in OpenCode. When ready to approve, sign with: 'Sign-off: I approve' and your GitHub handle. If you need edits, list them and reference PR comments. Thank you!

@patch Please take ownership of the PRD review for wf-r1d.2. Action: run the review checklist posted in beads (wf-r1d.2 comment) and paste your Reviewer response there. If you accept, sign with: 'Sign-off: I approve @<github-handle> YYYY-MM-DD'. If edits are required, list them in the beads comment and add line-level PR comments in docs/dev/prd-ooda-loop.md. Expected response SLA: 48 hours. If you cannot, please delegate to another reviewer and note whom in beads.

title: Delegation: @patch assigned PRD review for wf-r1d.2

parts.text: Give me a list of all local branches, there last mosdified date and the most recent log message

title: Listing local Git branches with last modified date and latest commit message
